speakers.name: Rishikesh Kale
speakers.description: One of the best blockchain developers in the country He's an early builder at Filecoin and has also won more than 6 major Web3 Hackathons.

speakers.name: Anshul Rustaggi
speakers.description: Creator of ZionVerse, India's own metaverse, with unmatched expertise in virtual gaming and NFTs.

speakers.name: Abhishek Bhaskar
speakers.role: Beatboxer, Emcee, NFT Artist, Metaverse Designer, Architect
speakers.description: Creator of The Metavoice Project: World's 1st Beatboxing generated Digital NFT Art and a web3 evangelist.

speakers.name: Daniel Akpobare
speakers.description: Currently associated with Calyptus - A platform that helps web developers transition to full-stack blockchain developers. He is one of the pioneers of Blockchain adoption in Africa.

speakers.name: Shreya Bahu
speakers.role: Head of Blockchain at Narra8ive, Solana Foundation Tutor
speakers.description: Head of Blockchain at Narra8ive and a coveted tutor at Solana Foundation.

speakers.name: Shubham Raj
speakers.description: He's currently developing at Cerebrum, which aims to bring self-sovereign identity to as many people as possible. Heâ€™s been an Ethereum Fellow, Solana Protocol Member and also a Polygon Advocate.

speakers.name: Stefano Calandriello
speakers.description: The Founder of Pizza Wallet. Pizza Wallet aims to makes the process of setting up a wallet as easy as eating a slice of pizza. The ease of web2 with the security of web3.

speakers.name: Venkatesha
speakers.description: Works at Atlassian with expertise in software and team collaboration tools.

speakers.name: Prashant Yadav
speakers.role: Student at IIIT Lucknow, FOSS Enthusiast
speakers.description: Student at IIIT Lucknow with a passion for open-source software.

speakers.name: Vandana Singh
speakers.description: Vandana Singh is an SDE-II at Glance and a skilled Mobile App Developer with 5 years of experience in native Android and Flutter development. She specializes in building high-performance apps with a strong focus on user experience and bug resolution.

speakers.name: Pratyush Mitta
speakers.role: Co-Founder of Mittal Analytics Private Limited
speakers.description: Pratyush Mitta is the Co-Founder of Mittal Analytics Private Limited. Passionate about web designing and blogging, he aims to build smart, automated web solutions by integrating his technical and financial expertise.

speakers.name: Yash
speakers.description: Yash is a Backend Engineer at Yarasi, active Django Software Foundation member, and DjangoNaut Fellow. He co-runs DjangoIndia and FOSSCU-k, promoting open-source knowledge across India. Specializes in Python, Django, and System Design.
